revised_title: The True Position of the Chief Nebular Line in the Spectrum of Orion
tldr: The author conducted a series of observations on the Orion Nebula to determine the exact position of the chief nebular line. They found that the line is at a wavelength of 5006.22, with a probable error of 0.014. This discovery helped to establish the true origin of the chief nebular line and disprove its connection with the magnesium fluting at 5006.36.
